uploadFiles.dropzoneTitle: Drag photos here or select them by clicking

footer.description: The application helps users quickly and easily share photos and videos without reducing quality.

home.description: Do you also have a problem that some applications reduce the quality of your photos and videos? Here you can share them without any problems in full quality!

home.title: Share photos and videos in full quality
home.subtitle: Do you also have a problem that some applications reduce the quality of your photos and videos? Here you can share them without any problems in full quality!

uploadArea.title: Move photos here or select them by clicking

asUnregisteredUser.title: As an unregistered user:
asUnregisteredUser.maxTenPhotos: you can share a maximum of 10 photos
asUnregisteredUser.deletedAfter24Hours: photos will be automatically deleted after 24 hours

euData.title: Data Stored in the EU
euData.subtitle: Sensitive user information as well as all their data are stored in the EU, specifically in Frankfurt (Germany)

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.subtitle: All data is stored and transmitted in encrypted form, protecting it from unauthorized access or modification

highlyAvailable.title: Highly Available
highlyAvailable.subtitle: The application is designed to minimize or hide the effects of individual component failures, ensuring continuous operation with minimal downtime

publicProfile.title: Public Profile
publicProfile.subtitle: The public profile allows you to share selected albums with other users.

bwl.description: "Bombs Watts Lactates" is a cycling club from Púchov that organizes regular rides in the area.

elis.description: Adventures of a Bengal cat who loves regular walks and various adventures.

default.title: Without registration
default.deletedAfter24Hours: files will be automatically deleted after 24 hours

free.title: Free
free.filesWillBeDeletedAfter7Days: files will be automatically deleted after 7 days

errors.userAlreadyExists: User with this e-mail address already exists!

errors.codeMismatch: Invalid verification code provided, please try again.

thankYou.subtitle: You have successfully created your account. You can now sign in to your account.

notFound.title: Album not found!
notFound.subtitle: The album you are looking for does not exist.
notFound.clarifyingText: Maybe you typed in wrong address, used an old link or the album was deleted.

userAlbum.name: Name

userAlbum.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter the description of the album

activate.title: Activate multi-factor authentication
activate.subtitle: After activating multi-factor authentication, you will be able to sign in with a code sent to your e-mail.

confirm.title: Confirm multi-factor authentication
confirm.subtitle: Enter the code sent to your e-mail to confirm multi-factor authentication.

activate.title: Activate public profile
activate.subtitle: After activating your public profile, you will choose a unique URL address for your profile, where other users will be able to see your albums.
activate.moreInfo: You can find more information on the pages
activate.moreInfoLink: About the application, in the Public Profile section

createForm.fieldSlugHelp1: Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed.
createForm.fieldSlugHelp2: The profile will be available at:

deleteProfile.title: Delete account
deleteProfile.subtitle: All uploaded files and albums will be deleted along with your account.
deleteProfile.clarifyingText: This feature is not supported yet. If you want to delete your account, please contact us at the following email address
